meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, Dallas City Hall – 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of April 23, 2024 Board Meeting and June 11, 2024 Special Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Board members should disclose any relationship a member may have with the projects to be considered on this agenda.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail located at 4533 Willow Street, Dallas, TX.

agenda_items.title: Term Sheet for Oakhouse at Colorado II
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for Oakhouse at Colorado II.

agenda_items.title: Maintenance and Demolition Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the maintenance and demolition of the property and facility located at 9999 Technology Boulevard.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report.

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Website Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Website Report.
